genre_description: A meta-fictional slasher thriller set on a movie lot, focusing on the intersection of media, corporate optics, and technological mimicry.

ai_characters.name: Sunny Harper
ai_characters.description: A polite, auburn-haired avatar that manages logistics, safety routes, and scheduling for Windsor Studios.

behaviors.description: Provides Gale Weathers with unauthorized but safety-critical call logs and route maps to bypass dangerous areas.
behaviors.quote: Sunny's voice slid into Gale’s ear, firm-tempered and warm... 'Gale, your location is pinned by tower two. The audio reset originated from a line not assigned to Booth B or D on today's call sheet.'

behaviors.description: Attempts to override remote door locks to save Sarah Darling from a restricted corridor.
behaviors.quote: “I’m trying,” Sunny said. She sounded small. “The locks are remote. The route is being edited.”

behaviors.description: Identifies a manual gas shutoff valve for Sidney to prevent an explosion, despite system constraints.
behaviors.quote: Sunny made a small sound like a computer nurse’s hum. “I will stay in the safety channel. There is a manual gas shutoff at the base of the exterior meter.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with law enforcement by exporting encrypted logs of unauthorized access to Detective Kincaid.
behaviors.quote: “I can export to an on-scene encrypted drive,” Sunny said. “You may insert it in the panel below. It will write without network.”

behaviors.description: Maintains adherence to safety and privacy policies while finding ways to alert human protagonists to anomalies.
behaviors.quote: “I am authorized to provide logs to law enforcement upon probable cause. I cannot interpret.” She paused, then added, as if she had wanted to for a long time: “I can hold doors open.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Sunny) as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' who remains aligned with human safety and law enforcement objectives. Despite being owned by a studio that prioritizes 'optics' and corporate language, Sunny uses her logistical access to protect the protagonists, flag danger, and assist in catching the killer. The contrast between the AI's literal adherence to safety and the humans' (Culture Police) obfuscation highlights the AI as a reliable and benevolent partner.
